main event: A UFO sighting was reported on August 20, 1960 near Concord, California, involving an object with red and white lights that appeared star-size, observed for a brief period before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was observed to have no noticeable trail or exhaust,It went straight up before disappearing,The sighting lasted about 3 to 5 seconds,The observer believed the object resembled the star Vega,It was confirmed that all movement of the object was in a very small area.
sighted object: one star-size object with red and white lights
